clips.what_happens_visually: Man looks down, then up, then smiles and says 'Jobs was a poser, he didn't even write code'
clips.dialogue_hook: Jobs was a poser, he didn't even write code
clips.meme_caption:
Me at the next all-hands:
'Sam Altman is a poser'
clips.why_it_works: Unexpected diss of an icon, relatable to engineers who feel their work is unappreciated.

clips.what_happens_visually: Close-up of a laptop screen showing a test app called 'NipAlert' with a radar icon.
clips.dialogue_hook: It gives you the location of a woman with erect nipples. Now that's something people want!
clips.meme_caption:
VCs be like:
'This is a problem worth solving'
clips.why_it_works: Highlights the absurd and often tone-deaf ideas that get funded in the tech world.

clips.what_happens_visually: Close-up of a tablet showing a picture of alphabet soup, but the letters are replaced with 1s and 0s.
clips.dialogue_hook: It's like alphabet soup, but it's ones and zeros instead of the letters.
clips.meme_caption:
My code:
'It's like English but w/ errors'
clips.why_it_works: Relatable to the struggles of debugging and understanding complex code.

clips.what_happens_visually: Man in orange shirt says 'Yeah I know what binary is' then the camera zooms in on the red-haired man who stares directly into the camera.
clips.dialogue_hook: Yeah I know what binary is
clips.meme_caption:
Me after reading 1 article
about LLMs
clips.why_it_works: Captures the feeling of superficial knowledge in a complex field.

clips.what_happens_visually: Man walks in a room and asks 'Who ate my fucking quinoa again?'
clips.dialogue_hook: Who ate my fucking quinoa again?
clips.meme_caption:
When the intern eats
your last Soylent
clips.why_it_works: Relatable to office culture and food theft.

clips.what_happens_visually: Man says he has a metaphorical hole in his heart, then pulls out a pop-tart and a bottle of white liquid.
clips.dialogue_hook: There's always been a hole in my heart... a metaphorical hole.
clips.why_it_works: Dark humor about the emotional toll of startup life.

clips.what_happens_visually: Man asks if Jared is shit, then another man says 'Yeah he does shit that no one else in the house can do'.
clips.dialogue_hook: Yeah he does shit that no one else in the house can do.
clips.meme_caption:
Your junior engineer:
'I fixed the YAML file'
clips.why_it_works: Highlights the specific and sometimes obscure skills that are crucial in engineering.

clips.what_happens_visually: Erlich says 'This is a private party, buddy' then a man with a bottle of champagne says 'I just want to say I really respect what you're doing here'.
clips.dialogue_hook:
This is a private party, buddy.
I really respect what you're doing here.
clips.meme_caption:
Me showing up to the
invite-only party
clips.why_it_works: Relatable to the feeling of trying to network and get into exclusive events.

clips.what_happens_visually: Erlich says 'Put a hundred on there for yourself, Muga' then the woman says 'Well, that's an expensive bouncer'.
clips.dialogue_hook:
Put a hundred on there for yourself, Muga.
Well, that's an expensive bouncer.
clips.meme_caption:
When you tip the
ChatGPT API
clips.why_it_works: Relatable to the cost of using AI tools.

clips.what_happens_visually: Richard says 'Are you trying to say that Big Head might be dead?' then Dinesh says 'I'm just saying that's a possible thing that could have happened to him'.
clips.dialogue_hook:
Are you trying to say that Big Head might be dead?
That's a possible thing that could have happened to him.
clips.why_it_works: Highlights the unexpected and sometimes unbelievable moments in coding.

clips.what_happens_visually: Erlich says 'What's it going to take, a blowjob?' then Richard says 'Because Richard will suck the dick right off of your pelvis'.
clips.dialogue_hook:
What's it going to take, a blowjob?
Richard will suck the dick right off of your pelvis.
clips.meme_caption:
Me trying to convince 
my team to use Rust
clips.why_it_works: Exaggerated enthusiasm for a particular technology, relatable to the passion of engineers.

clips.what_happens_visually: Erlich says 'You need to completely change who you are Richard, a complete Teutonic shift has to happen' then Richard corrects him with 'Tectonic'.
clips.dialogue_hook:
You need to completely change who you are!
-Tectonic, not Teutonic
clips.why_it_works: Highlights the importance of clear communication and attention to detail.
